name: Operation Clean Street
description:
This game is only a single level made for DIG 2783 Fundamentals of Game Art 

It is an experimental game that will analyze how propaganda affects main stream American society’s view on the marginalized and disenfranchised.

All code, audio, and art assets were made by me. It is the only game that I have made where I did not collaborate with anyone or find certain assets online (such as audio assets).

I hope you enjoy.
